name: SWFExportPreference
shortdesc: SWF export settings for the application object.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the SWFExportPreference &#40;a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: flattenTransparency
property.shortdesc: Flatten transparency when exporting.

property.name: dynamicMediaHandling
property.shortdesc: The dynamic media handling options.

property.name: pageTransitionOverride
property.shortdesc: The name of the page transition to use for all pages.

property.name: swfBackground
property.shortdesc: SWF background setting

property.name: frameRate
property.shortdesc: The frame rate in frames per second.

property.name: fitMethod
property.shortdesc: The fitting method to use.

property.name: fitOption
property.shortdesc: The options for fitting to predefined dimension.

property.name: fitScale
property.shortdesc: The size fits to given scale percentage.

property.name: fitWidthAndHeight
property.shortdesc: The size fits to given width and height.

property.name: pageRange
property.shortdesc: The pages to print, specified either as an enumeration or a string. To specify a range, separate page numbers in the string with a hyphen &#40;-). To specify separate pages, separate page numbers in the string with a comma (,). Can return: PageRange enumerator or String.

property.name: dynamicDocumentExportReaderSpreads
property.shortdesc: If true, each spread in the exported document is combined into a single page that has spread's original width.

property.name: rasterizePages
property.shortdesc: If true, all the pages in the exported document will be rasterized.

property.name: generateHTML
property.shortdesc: Flag indicates whether to generate HTML.

property.name: textExportPolicy
property.shortdesc: The text export policy.

property.name: includeInteractivePageCurl
property.shortdesc: Flag indicates whether to include interactive page curl when export to SWF.

property.name: rasterCompression
property.shortdesc: The SWF raster compression options.

property.name: jpegQualityOptions
property.shortdesc: The JPEG quality options.

property.name: curveQuality
property.shortdesc: The SWF curve quality.

property.name: rasterResolution
property.shortdesc: The raster resolution.

property.name: resamplingType
property.shortdesc: The resampling type.

property.name: resamplingThreshold
property.shortdesc: The resampling threshold.

property.name: useNetworkAccess
property.shortdesc: Flag indicates whether to allow to use network access when export to SWF.

property.name: viewSWFAfterExporting
property.shortdesc: Flag indicates to whether to view the SWF after exporting.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the SWFExportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
